name: Extreme Monster Truck Stunt Racing 3D Full
name_original: Extreme Monster Truck Stunt Racing 3D Full
description:
Dive into the atmosphere of stunt race full of adrenaline! Try different monster trucks and choose your favorite one! Feel the extreme driving a monster truck, jump over thrilling obstacles and speed through terrifying loops! Survive the most dangerous stunt arena with Extreme Monster Truck Stunt Racing 3D! Tired of driving down smooth asphalt roads? It’s high time to start a race full of adrenaline!

Sit behind the steering wheel of a powerful 4x4 car! Drive mega trucks on a rugged racing course! Tighten your seat belt to drive powerful monster truck through a track full of treacherous hills and risky paths. Go for the giant leaps and loops, cross nasty hurdles coming on your way driving at the high speed and feel extreme! Try not to smash or even demolish your car! It’s not like playing usual racing games or driving simulators - prove your stunt skills dodging obstacles and flying through hoops! Gain ultimate hill climbing, jumping and racing experience! Ever tried to drive huge powerful truck? Or are you risky enough to ride through tricky and slippery hill paths? Get to know with Extreme Monster Truck Stunt Racing 3D! Be ready for crazy racing experience full of adrenaline! If you’re tired of the usual racing games and need to destroy or crash something - handle the power with 4 wheels on a stunt track full of dangers!

This game includes tons of courses with huge jumps, hill-climbs, raised platforms, loop-the-loops and unbelievable angled roads designed to challenge the best drivers! Start a race full of adrenaline! Try new car stunt game in 3D! Pull off awesome tricks, explore wild race tracks, try massive jumps and insane obstacles! Prove your worth as a driver - only highly skilled one could survive this dangerous high speed race! Start this thrilling ride driving a massive monster car – jump over obstacles, cross hurdles and fly high performing new car stunt! Powerful engines, nitro boosts and other upgrades will blow your mind! Gain thrilling driving experience racing through trick tracks and obstacles! Be ready for a speedy ride full of adrenaline playing Extreme Monster Truck Stunt Racing 3D!

Gain amazing monster truck simulation experience be ready for a ride full of adrenaline! Speed on the race track and take off in the air with the most thrilling jumps driving your monster truck! Prove your agility performing extreme car stunts with this driving game in 3D! Sit behind the steering wheel of a powerful truck perform stunts, drive through treacherous hills and risky paths and prove your stunt skills dodging obstacles and flying through hoops. Be ready to perform stunts and escape hurdles with Extreme Monster Truck Stunt Racing 3D!

Extreme Monster Truck Stunt Racing 3D features:

- Different stunt racing tracks – dodge through obstacles, cross hurdlers, maneuver through treacherous hills and risky paths.
- Powerful monster trucks to perform extreme stunts
- Exciting stunting missions – great hill climbing, jumping, dodging and racing experience
- 3D monster truck simulator

Participate in ultimate stunt race in 3D! Gain speedy car riding experience with Extreme Monster Truck Stunt Racing 3D game! Dive into the atmosphere of thrilling driving and be ready for monster truck race full of adrenaline! Dash and ride through the stunt city at lightning fast speed displaying cool tricks! It’s high time to become a stunt monster!
